abstract: Coverage about John R. Bolton’s unpublished book was evidence of the need to call the former aide as a witness, the lawmaker said.
lead_paragraph: Representative Adam B. Schiff of California, the lead Democratic House manager, opened by referring to The New York Times’s revelation on Friday that President Trump’s role in the Ukraine pressure campaign began earlier than previously known. Mr. Schiff emphasized that Pat A. Cipollone, the White House counsel, was present when the president delivered that instruction.
